item.title: Quickscoping is back in MW3
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

My favorite experience on XBL was one kid who sounded about 11 said “SUCK MY DICK KID”, and I replied, “Do you even know what that means yet?”, and he said, “Well…not really.”

Read full topic

item.title: Quickscoping is back in MW3
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:37, topic:413451”]I have a question regarding that kit that allows you to keep your current killstreak after you die. If you die twice, does the killstreak reset, or how is it eventually reset? Also, are you forced to use the killstreaks inside that class or can you choose different ones? Let’s hope it’s only the first option.[/quote]I’m not sure if multiple kills will set you back for support, but you should keep your killstreak. And the options are what they are; Assault, which is how killstreaks work now, Support, which strictly supports the team and a death won’t set you back, and Specialist, where you get extra perks after 2, 4 and 6 kills, and getting all of the perks in the game at 8 (yeah, really). Also, each strike package can be assigned to classes, so you can be going UAV, CUAV and Directional UAV in one class, and UAV, Predator Missile, and Reaper in another.

Read full topic

item.title: Quickscoping is back in MW3
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

I have a question regarding that kit that allows you to keep your current killstreak after you die. If you die twice, does the killstreak reset, or how is it eventually reset? Also, are you forced to use the killstreaks inside that class or can you choose different ones? Let’s hope it’s only the first option.

Read full topic

item.title: Quickscoping is back in MW3
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

the elve age:

Black ops has been the FAR worst CoD game yet. MW2 was MUCH better

Are you kidding me? Modern Warfare 2 is literally unplayable, it’s that broken.

[ul][li]Stopping Power perk[/li]
[li]Commando perk[/li]
[li]Danger Close perk[/li]
[li]One Man Army perk[/li]
[li]Death streaks[/li]
[li]Shotguns as secondaries[/li]
[li]Kills from kill streaks counting towards future kill streaks[/li]
[li]Quickscoping[/li]
[li]Nuke[/li][/ul]

To name a few things wrong with it, and by no means am I saying Black Ops is good as it definitely has faults of it’s own, but it’s not nearly as fucked to hell as Modern Warfare 2 is. It’s beyond me how anyone can like or play that game.

Read full topic

item.title: Quickscoping is back in MW3
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:31, topic:413451”]^ Maybe, but we got dem airburst 'nade launchers now.

Oh yeah, if anyone wants info for multiplayer guns and perks and such for MW3, here:
http://beta.digitalwarfare247.com/games/modernwarfare3/195-mw3-multiplayer-info-blowout[/quote]

28 killstreak rewards…wow.

I noticed that the RPG is unlocked at level 80…is that the max level or is it higher?

Some parts sound fun and interesting, while others sound like crap. It’s almost TOO much being offered in one game. I’m not sure about BF3s amount, but I’ve always loved BF since I started playing it more than CoD.

BF3 does have the potential to surpass CoD in copies sold this year. It’s going to be released first, and then when people see what it’s like looking over their friend’s shoulder it’ll cause a chain reaction.

I pre-ordered both already. Can’t wait to play them, and I guess just play what you like more.

Read full topic

item.title: Quickscoping is back in MW3
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

From the multiplayer trailer this game looks like it’s going to be complete shit. Yes I will buy it, but I won’t be playing it nearly as much as BF3. BF3 is just too sexy looking (I wish the 32 vs. 32 was on 360 :().

There are way too many killstreaks.
Two equipment pieces?
-Motion sensors are back? Seriously?
-Bouncing betties and claymores?
-An equipment that shoots down rockets that are shooting down the overpowered killstreaks?
The guns sound like shit.
I could go watch it again and name more too.

Camping was bad enough in MW2 and Black Ops, and looks like MW3 is going to try and double it.

Read full topic
